Blue
----

Default in sphinx13 theme.


Orange
------

Created manually in GIMP by colorizing blue versions with hue=27, saturation=68, lightness=22.


Green
-----

convert <item>bg-blue.png -fx "green*u*1.55+green*u/2" <item>bg-green.png


Orange / Red
------------

convert <item>bg-orange.png -fx "yellow*u/3+red*u/2" <item>bg-orangered.png


Red
---

convert <item>bg-orange.png -fx "yellow*u/5+red*u/3" <item>bg-red.png
